### <span style="color: darkblue;">**Steven M. Brunwasser, Ph.D.**</span> Principal Investigator


Steve is an Assistant Professor in the [Department of Psychology](https://csm.rowan.edu/departments/psychology/index.html) at Rowan University and an Adjunct Research Assistant Professor of Medicine at [Vanderbilt University Medical Center](https://medicine.vumc.org/). He received his doctoral degree in Psychology from the University of Michigan in 2012 and completed a T32 Postdoctoral Fellowship at Vanderbilt University.
